    public async Task<TResponse> Send<TResponse>(IRequest<TResponse> request)

        switch (request)

                return ToResponse<TResponse>(

        switch (notification)

            default:
                throw new ArgumentException($"No handlers for {notification.GetType().Name}");

    private async Task<string> HandleGetProductRequestWithBehaviors(Test.MultipleRequests.GetProductRequest request)

        return await _test_MultipleRequests_GetProductRequestHandler.Handle(request);
